backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount node and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with FoodPostsProvider.
frontend/src/components/add-food/forms/A: Single-page card form for adding food posts with validation and navigation to NGO Alert.
Drawer-based form that opens from the bottom to input food details and submit posts.
Two-step wizard form for adding food with progress indicator and validation.
frontend/src/components/add-food/useAddF: Validation hook checking required fields for Add Food forms and returning error messages.
Defines the main layout with a header, content outlet, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with Home and History buttons highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are currently implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines theme variables for colors, typography, and eco-green utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AddFoodPage.tsx: Page with tabs allowing users to add food using card, wizard, or drawer forms.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays a list of food posts from the store or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page offering quick navigation to add food and showing a placeholder map of nearby NGOs.
frontend/src/pages/NgoAlertPage.tsx: Shows an NGO alert with route map and the most recent food post, plus navigation options.
frontend/src/state/FoodPostsProvider.tsx: Simple provider wrapper for potential future food posts context.
frontend/src/state/foodPostsStore.ts: Zustand store managing food posts with add and most-recent retrieval functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and animations with an eco-green palette.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, required placeholder images, and a list of existing UI and theme features to implement for a responsive web version of the prototype. Contains no code, only structured project state and requirements.
